root.name: Roary the Racing Car
root.description: Roary the Racing Car is a Nintendo DS game based around the children's television show of the same name. The game features different puzzles and similar content in order to challenge younger gamers and act in an educational manner. The game is based on the same characters as the television program. Â Roary was released into the Nintendo DS console's library in 2009, but seems likely to have been a poor seller. It was developed by a company called GSP.
